title: Arclight Vayne strikes down the unworthy

replies.body:
{{champion:110}} Welcome

{{champion:161}} Think you will fit in just fine here.

{{champion:67}} Thank you. But who are we fighting?

{{champion:110}} The greatest source of darkness.

{{champion:67}} Nocturne? 

{{champion:161}} Nope.

{{champion:67}} Zed?

{{champion:110}} Not even close.

{{champion:67}} ....Veigar?

{{champion:110}} {{champion:161}} Hahahahahahahahaha!!!!

{{champion:67}} Then who?

{{champion:110}} Riot's Servers.

My jimmies have been rustled by this comment.
{{champion:45}} I am evil, stop laughing!
I'm pretty sure that was a short joke.
Is your Summoner name Best VeigarFL as in the best Veigar in Florida? If so I love your summoner name. If not... I still love it !:)
LOL I was expecting them to say {{champion:17}} SATAN
Was going to at first but then I was like "Done that already, what else can I say?"
omfg wow. The severs themselves, like the lag, or the toxins lurching within (aka. the mean people)  Either way, I agree.
I don't know, ever since Krepo put ham in the servers during the URFitational, more people have been bringing the bacon in my games.
I love how they just laugh when Vieger's name is in the discussion. Don't know if you did on purpose but that was funny ;)
Did what on purpose? :P
Congrats you are more of a troll than {{champion:17}}  and {{champion:48}}  combined! Mwahahahahahah {{summoner:6}}
lol :D
You sir... win... you just... win everything.{{item:3078}}
yay
love it
LOL.

I just want Arclight {{champion:412}} 
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4429636&page=1#post46376620
New Line of Darklight skins, Thresh, Zed, Hec, Diana, and ashe.....
Two words... Darklight Lux
I'm down for Arclight Zed or Thresh. But for Hecarim, I'd rather see him in the Justicar theme. Maybe Arclight/Justicar Nocturne too.
No no, Darklight...... sort of an anti theme.....

Arclight zed seem nice, instead of shadows, it'll be Light clones
and the shuriken would be a solar disc.

Instead of Ashe, I'd choose someone like Quinn who doesn't have many skins. She could be wearing dark clothes, her passive would be dark too. Her ult would be a crow or something like that. I think she has a lot of potential for a Darklight skin! More than the other adcs!

Not another adc arclight PLEAAASE!
{{champion:133}}  = no no
Maybe he'll be last, sort of how Final Boss Veigar is to the arcade line?
That would be cool.
I just feel like it's missing a little something but can't put my finger on it :(
color, depth, detail, and shading.... :\

I'm not sure how I feel about this.
The splash art looks AMAZING, but the skin itself looks meh.
Wow, I actually don't like this skin very much :\ also, FIRST! :D

I like the style and its actually pretty cool, but Idk, its bland colors make it look as though it has very little detail put into it :( heck, you can barely see the cool looking light lines on her skin compared to the splash art, for awhile I didn't even think they were actually in the skin. In a weird way I really wish her face was as dark as it was in the splash art, the contrast of light/dark is really cool, and i love it in the splash art. But I know it wouldn't fit thematically with the skin, or how shadow would be cast on her face in summons rift (and other maps) so I understand why. It just kinda sucks :\ splash art awesome :O ...skin.... not so much :\
I kinda have to agree (Braces for the downvotes) and also, SECOND :D

yea, and the way that in the splash art, it feels so dynamic, her hair is flowing and shes in motion, but the skin, her hair is this thin little pony tail and it just looks weird, wish it was like Warden Sivirs hair. and if you look, the arm with the crossbow, the cuffs underneath dont even look the same, splash art = AWESOME, skin = not so much... again....
once again these are just my opinions :) take em or leave em
I think the hair in game needs to be darker
The year is 2018. Every champion has either an Arclight or Debonair skin. The war is not pretty, but boy is it stylish.
But then...everything changed when the Battlecast Nation attacked.

{{champion:110}} arclight
{{champion:161}} arclight
{{champion:67}} arclight

So apparently your name has to start with a "V" to get an arclight skin
Take it back, give me Guardian of the Sands Xerath please.
pretty skin o_o i like it! ^^ cant wait to see new skins, and please make one soon for my love {{champion:91}}  <3
{{item:3073}} Just waiting for a new zed skin.

more like new zac skin pls
{{item:3070}} {{champion:154}} {{item:3070}}
Kinda delayed huh? Almost time for the next patch lol
Guardian of the Sands still have to come...
{{champion:33}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:101}} What about these skins why not out yet {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I want guardian of sands rammus so much {{item:3151}}
Sigh, I guess I won't be buying SKT T1 Vayne like I'd planned.

I don't get it, why do the textures on this skin look too flat and lack depth and tone? There is an obvious lack of contrast on her clothes, her armor, her skin, and her hair. The body marks should look a bit more obvious too.
This is lovely and all, but I have one little question: WHEN ARE THE GUARDIANS COMING?!
The light knight

WIth the limitations of the Vayne rig, I'd say, good job team. It's a fine balance of splash art to inspire the purchase, and the longevity of the actual skin to hold interest. The dark drama of the splash really isn't possible with the style of global lighting on SR. Maaaaybe in Twisted Treeline... if they lowered the exposure on her but beefed the glowy bits. That would be pretty interesting... and probably terrible to play against.The FX [look pretty sweet](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dNf0ZJuaDtw), though!
Did they play with something covering her eyes? A visor or some half mask from forehead to nose? A band of light? Who knows!
